name: percentile
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
one of the points into which a large range of numbers, results, etc. is divided to make 100 groups of the same size: That score puts you in the 97th percentile.
SMART Vocabulary: related words and phrases

See more results »
Add to word list
Add to word list
GRAPHS & CHARTS, MEASURES one of the 100 equal parts that a set of people or things is divided into, when you are comparing a particular characteristic relating to them: His salary put him in the 75th percentile of chief executives. The investment fund is ranked in the top fourth percentile in its category. See also
decile
median noun
quartile
